title: volume down not silencing a call's ringtone anymore since A10. is there a way to enable it again ?
content:
before A10, whenever i received a call and wanted to silence the ringtone without rejecting the call i would just press the volume down button.
since the update, it does nothing.
i looked everywhere for this setting to see if it was disabled or something, but couldnt find a trace.
i did find the "turn down phone calls using the power button" feature
